title: Trava
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, International, Organic, Raw, Western, Fast food, Salad bar, Juice bar, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. An all organic restaurant offers a vegan and vegetarian menu. Only outdoor seating for summer. Wi-fi. It's a bit hard to find; look through the trees and you'll see a building that looks like a flying saucer which is a Chinese tea house, and the restaurant is adjacent to it.
